Class Sat4jMutableSatSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.prop4j.explain.solvers.impl.AbstractSatProblem
      • org.prop4j.explain.solvers.impl.AbstractSatSolver<org.sat4j.specs.ISolver>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MutableSatSolver, SatProblem, SatSolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sat4jAllMusExtractor, Sat4jMusExtractor

    public class Sat4jMutableSatSolver
extends Sat4jSatSolver
implements MutableSatSolver
    A mutable SAT solver using a Sat4J oracle.
    Author:
    Timo Günther

      • addClause

        public int addClause(Node clause)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSatProblem
        Adds the given CNF clause to the problem. It must be a non-empty disjunction of literals.
        Parameters:
        clause - clause to add; not null
        Returns:
        the index of the newly added clause

      • push

        public void push()
        Description copied from interface: MutableSatSolver
        Enters a more local scope. The next pop will remove all clauses of the newest instead of the old scope.
        Specified by:
        push in interface MutableSatSolver

      • pop

        public java.util.List<Node> pop()
                         throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Description copied from interface: MutableSatSolver
        Exits the current scope for a less local one. Removes all clauses that have been added since the last push.
        Specified by:
        pop in interface MutableSatSolver
        Returns:
        the removed clauses; not null
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there are no stack levels left

      • getClauseIndexFromIndex

        public int getClauseIndexFromIndex(int index)
        Description copied from class: Sat4jSatSolver
        Returns the internal clause index for the given Sat4J clause index. Sat4J clause indexes start at 1 instead of 0.
        Overrides:
        getClauseIndexFromIndex in class Sat4jSatSolver
        Parameters:

        Returns:
